title: Security Data Lake Architecture
subtitle: Building scalable detection and analytics platforms
learning_objectives: Architect security data lakes for varied telemetry
Enable multiple analytics consumers (SOC, threat intel)
Monitor platform health and plan DR

content_blocks.title: Prime Your Approach

content.text: Approach this module with curiosity and discipline—the balance necessary for enduring security improvements.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Be ready to explore and document every step.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Experts rely on this balance when delivering high-impact security programmes.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: Which data source delivers the most value once centralised?

content_blocks.title: Guiding Framework

content.text:
### LAKE
- **L**og ingestion strategy
- **A**rchitect storage tiers
- **K**eep governance controls
- **E**nable analytics consumers

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Use this mnemonic to structure your execution.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Structured frameworks accelerate adoption and review.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: Which step will demand the most cross-team coordination?

content_blocks.title: Guided Simulation

content.text:
1. Map current telemetry sources and consumers.
2. Draft a target architecture with ingestion, storage tiers, and analytics tools.
3. Identify governance controls and cost guardrails.
4. Present roadmap to stakeholders for feedback.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Rehearse before production to surface gaps early.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Simulations mirror tabletop and lab exercises in enterprise programmes.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What support do you need to complete this simulation?

content_blocks.title: Teach Back

content.text:
### Teach Back
- Summarise the framework for a peer.
- List two actions you will complete in the next sprint.
- Schedule a follow-up to review outcomes.

content_blocks.real_world_connection: Teams close every sprint with short teach-backs to leadership.
